title: How to Craft a Furnace in Terraria: A Beginner's Guide

steps.title: Craft a work bench and place it down.
steps.content: Craft a work bench and place it down. You'll need 10 wood blocks to craft it. Use an axe on nearby trees to get wood blocks. You can also find work benches by looting Dungeons and Underground Cabins .

steps.title: Gather 20 stone blocks, 4 wood blocks, and 3 torches.
steps.content: Gather 20 stone blocks, 4 wood blocks, and 3 torches. Stone blocks can be obtained by using the pickaxe on nearby stone. To craft a torch, you'll need 1 wood block and 1 gel. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Craft a furnace.
steps.content: Craft a furnace. While standing next to the work bench, open the Inventory's crafting menu and select the furnace icon. It will be placed in your inventory. On some platforms, you may need to drag it into your inventory. You can also craft other necessities, such as a loom , sawmill , and bed .
